text: The Lord spoke to Moses and to Aaron:
“Every one of the Israelites must camp under his standard with the emblems of his family; they must camp at some distance around the tent of meeting.
“Now those who will be camping on the east, toward the sunrise, are the divisions of the camp of Judah under their standard. The leader of the people of Judah is Nahshon son of Amminadab.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="0702 07657 0505 08337 03967">74,600</st>.

Those who will be <st data-num="02583" class="">camping</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">next</st> to them<n id="1" /> are the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st> is <st data-num="05417" class="">Nethanel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06686" class="">Zuar</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="0702 02572 0505 0702 03967">54,400</st>.

Next will be<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st> is <st data-num="0446" class="">Eliab</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02497" class="">Helon</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="07651 02572 0505 0702 03967">57,400</st>.
All those numbered of the camp of Judah, according to their divisions, are 186,400. They will travel at the front.
“On the south will be the divisions of the camp of Reuben under their standard. The leader of the people of Reuben is Elizur son of Shedeur.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="08337 0705 0505 02568 03967">46,500</st>.

Those who will be <st data-num="02583" class="">camping</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">next</st> to them are the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st> is <st data-num="08017" class="">Shelumiel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06701" class="">Zurishaddai</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="08672 02572 0505 07969 03967">59,300</st>.

Next will be<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st> is <st data-num="0460" class="">Eliasaph</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01845" class="">Deuel</st>.<n id="2" />
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="02568 0705 0505 08337 03967 02572">45,650</st>.
All those numbered of the camp of Reuben, according to their divisions, are 151,450. They will travel second.
“Then the tent of meeting with the camp of the Levites will travel in the middle of the camps. They will travel in the same order as they camped, each in his own place under his standard.
“On the west will be the divisions of the camp of Ephraim under their standard. The leader of the people of Ephraim is Elishama son of Ammihud.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="0705 0505 02568 03967">40,500</st>.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next</st> to them will be the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st> is <st data-num="01583" class="">Gamaliel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06301" class="">Pedahzur</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="08147 07970 0505 03967">32,200</st>.

Next will be<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> is <st data-num="027" class="">Abidan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01441" class="">Gideoni</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="02568 07970 0505 0702 03967">35,400</st>.
All those numbered of the camp of Ephraim, according to their divisions, are 108,100. They will travel third.
“On the north will be the divisions of the camp of Dan, under their standards. The leader of the people of Dan is Ahiezer son of Ammishaddai.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="08147 08346 0505 07651 03967">62,700</st>.

Those who will be <st data-num="02583" class="">camping</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">next</st> to them are the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st> is <st data-num="06295" class="">Pagiel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05918" class="">Ocran</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="0259 0705 0505 02568 03967">41,500</st>.

Next will be<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st>. The <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st> is <st data-num="0299" class="">Ahira</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05881" class="">Enan</st>.
Those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> in his <st data-num="06635" class="">division</st> are <st data-num="07969 02572 0505 0702 03967">53,400</st>.
All those numbered of the camp of Dan are 157,600. They will travel last, under their standards.”
These are the Israelites, numbered according to their families. All those numbered in the camps, by their divisions, are 603,550.
But the Levites were not numbered among the other Israelites, as the Lord commanded Moses.
So the Israelites did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses; that is the way they camped under their standards, and that is the way they traveled, each with his clan and family.
